channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:27 Alarm response in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:27 Alarm response in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Полтавська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 05:29 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk oblast.
